Class SimpleCopyNumberFilter

All Implemented Interfaces:
IChangeNotifier, IGenomicMarkerModel, java.lang.Iterable<GenomicMarker>, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
public class SimpleCopyNumberFilter
extends AbstractGenomicMarkerModel
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

Filters copy numbers such that only losses/gains/both or all markers are shown.

Author:
muellera

Nested Class Summary
static class SimpleCopyNumberFilter.Type
          Filter Type LOSS return only losses GAIN return only gains BOTH return losses and gains ALL return all markers (unfiltered)
